document_data.name: Westfront Cell
document_data.mainbody: The main '''Westfront holding cell''' was a jail cell in [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.Description: It was clean, dry, and well-lit. There were [[chain]]s from which people could be dangled.
document_data.History: After [[Storm Silverhand]], Marchioness of [[Immerdusk]], [[Arclath Delcastle]], noble heir of House [[Delcastle]], and [[Amarune Whitewave]], a mask dancer, were finally captured by [[Glathra]], they were left in the Westfront holding cell. They were then rescued by a hidden [[Elminster Aumar]], then in the form of a pile of ashes, controlling the [[War Wizard]] [[Welwyn Tracegar]] and having [[Mirt]] procure a carriage to hide the three of them.
